class PieceLoader[source]

PieceLoader(directory:str='data/')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Loads the 7 known tetronimo pieces from disk

{% raw %} 
ldr = PieceLoader()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert(ldr.pieces.keys() == {'j', 'l', 'q', 'z', 's', 't', 'i'})
